findings.title: Grinding Attack
findings.description: Also known as precomputation attack. It is an implementation-specific issue and affects PoS systems. By exploiting the lack of randomness in the slot leader election process, a slot leader is capable of manipulating the frequency of them being elected in subsequent blocks.

findings.title: Cryptographic Attack
findings.description: Common attack methods: Analytic Attack / Implementation Attack / Statistical Attack / Brute Force / Frequency Analysis and the Ciphertext Only Attack / Known Plaintext / Chosen Ciphertext / Chosen Plaintext / Meet in the Middle / Man in the Middle / Birthday attack / Replay attack / Collision attack

findings.title: Transaction Replay Attack
findings.description: Also known as Double Spend attack. An attacker attempts to spend the same currency at least two times by presenting a conflicting transaction possibly in a different branch.
